title: Fix your matchmaking!! Rito Pls!!!1!!
body:
RITO PLS!!
100 MMR difference in ranked game
3 ppl in my team lagged out.
Fix your matchmaking system

replies.body: Ok real talk. if you can't handle someone who is gold 2, you don't deserve to climb up right now. That match making isn't even bad.  s2-g4/3 might as well be the same thing.

biss please
I can handle up to Gold 1 just fine. I have won 3/0 against mid gold 1 zed in ranked game.
but it seems you forget that this is a team game, not an individual one
Maybe try sending this as a support ticket to get someones attention??
